body_html:
I also tried to follow these instructions and got an error
(py35)Dans-iMac:tensorflow dan$ bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package ERROR: /Users/dan/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:87:1: //tensorflow/core:protos_all_py: no such attribute 'imports' in 'py_library' rule. ERROR: /Users/dan/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD:23:1: Target '//tensorflow/core:framework_headers' contains an error and its package is in error and referenced by '//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package'. ERROR: Loading failed; build aborted. INFO: Elapsed time: 0.199s

I'd successfully been running the prebuilt binary, which I removed before starting these instructions.

body:
I also tried to follow these instructions and got an error
`
(py35)Dans-iMac:tensorflow dan$ bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
ERROR: /Users/dan/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:87:1: //tensorflow/core:protos_all_py: no such attribute 'imports' in 'py_library' rule.
ERROR: /Users/dan/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD:23:1: Target '//tensorflow/core:framework_headers' contains an error and its package is in error and referenced by '//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package'.
ERROR: Loading failed; build aborted.
INFO: Elapsed time: 0.199s
`

I'd successfully been running the prebuilt binary, which I removed before starting these instructions.
